examples.jmarkov

Class BBPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmarkov.MarkovProcess<S,E>
      • jmarkov.SimpleMarkovProcess<examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseState,examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseEvent>
        • examples.jmarkov.BBPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JMarkovElement

    public class BBPhase
extends SimpleMarkovProcess<examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseState,examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseEvent>
    This is the Java implementation for the Bucket Brigades System using Phase Distribution. This code is based on the Bucket Brigades - Java Modelling created by Diego Rojas
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    Juan Pablo Alvarado, Germán Riaño, PhD

      • BBPhase

        public BBPhase(int N,
       int M,
       ContPhaseVar[] machineTimes,
       double[][] vels)
        Builds a Bucket Brigade system.
        Parameters:
        N - Number of worker
        M - Number of machines
        machineTimes - PH distributions
        vels - Vels[i][i] is the relative velocities for workeri at machine j

      • active

        public boolean active(examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseState i,
             examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseEvent e)
        Description copied from class: SimpleMarkovProcess
        Determines if event e is active when the system is in state i. It has to be implemented by a subclass.
        Specified by:
        active in class SimpleMarkovProcess<examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseState,examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseEvent>
        Parameters:
        i - The current State
        e - The current Event.
        Returns:
        True if the Event is Active.

          examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseState j,
          examples.jmarkov.BBPhaseEvent e)
        These are the SimpleMarkovProcess methods.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        i - Current state
        j - Destination State
        e - The occuring event

      • description

        public java.lang.String description()
        Description copied from class: MarkovProcess
        This method should be implemented by the subclass to give word description of the model. For example it should say: Queueing system with 2 servers and exponential arrivals with rate 50 per hour.
        Specified by:
        description in interface JMarkovElement
